about.title: Informatione
about.description: Deadlock Mod Manager isch es Tool zum Installiere und Verwalte vo Mods f√ºr s'Valve-Spiel "Deadlock".
about.gamebananaDescription: √úsi prim√§ri Mod-Quelle und s'r√ºckrad vo dere Awendig. GameBanana b√ºtet die umfassendi Mod-Datenbank und API, wos durchsueche, Entdecke und abelade vo Deadlock-Mods m√∂glich macht.
about.tauriDescription: s'leistungsstarke Framework, das die plattform√ºbergriifende Desktop-Awendig erm√∂glicht. Tauri kombiniert di besten Web-Technologie mit nativer Leistig und Sicherheit.
about.shadcnDescription: Sch√∂ni und zueg√§nglichi React-Komponente, wo Grundlage f√ºr √ºsi moderni Benutzeroberfl√§chi bildet. Kopiered, if√ºeged und perfekt apassed.
about.tailwindDescription: Das Utility-First CSS-Framework, wo √ºsi responsives Design und konsistentes Styling i de gsamte Awendig unterst√ºtzt.
about.openSourceDescription: Erstellt mit erstundliche Open Source-Technologie mit React, TypeScript und vielne andere Bibliotheke, die modern Awendig erm√∂glicht. Viele  Dank a alli Mittw√ºrkende und Betr√§uer.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.welcome: Welcome to the latest version of {{appName}}!

0.9.2.title: Settings & Configuration
features: ‚öôÔ∏è Game path settings - manually configure your game installation path for better compatibility

0.9.0.title: Mod Management & System Improvements
features: üìã Mods ordering - organize your mods exactly how you want them
üîç Local package scanning - automatically detect existing mods in your game directory
üìä Reporting system - help improve the app by reporting issues
üêß Fixed Linux builds and scroll issues with pre-bundled GLS
‚ú® Some UI & UX polish
üîç Search persistence through navigation

0.8.2.title: Bug Fixes & Improvements
features: üêõ Fixed various bugs and improved stability
‚ö° Performance improvements and optimizations

0.8.1.title: Technical Improvements
features: üîß Updated to use HTTP plugin for all API calls for improved reliability

0.8.0.title: Major Features & UI Updates + New Languages
features: üì§ Support for local mods is here!
üéµ Added volume slider for audio mod previews
üåç Added 7 new languages: Arabic, German, French, Polish, Russian, Turkish, and Swiss German
üîΩ Drag and drop mod files directly into the app
üåô Light mode now follows your system theme automatically
‚ú® Filter settings now persist when navigating between pages, we also added "Exclude" filter mode
üì± Added bottom bar with status indicators for mods, downloads

0.7.0.title: Major Features & UI Refresh
features: üì¶ Multi-file download support - choose which files to install when mods have multiple archives
üîí NSFW content filtering with user controls for safe browsing
‚öôÔ∏è Advanced gameinfo.gi management for better mod compatibility
üé® Brand new logo design and enhanced UI styling throughout the app
üöÄ Improved launch button animations and enhanced settings layout
üìç Smart scroll position management - keep your scroll position while browsing mods
üîç Enhanced search relevance and sorting capabilities for better mod discovery

0.6.1.title: Deep Links & Improvements
features: üîó Added support for 1-click install links on GameBanana

0.6.0.title: Audio Mod Support & Launch Options
features: üéµ Added support for audio mods - customize your Deadlock sounds
üöÄ Improved launch options handling - no longer assumes "+" prefix requirement
üîß Enhanced mod compatibility and installation process
‚ö° Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.1.title: Performance & Bug Fixes
features: üöÄ Added virtualization to mods page for significantly better performance
üîß Fixed "last updated" sort option not reflecting actual mod timestamps
üè∑Ô∏è Added category and hero filters for better mod discovery
‚ùå Added clear button to search input for quick search reset
üîç Improved filtering and searching functionality on the mods page
üê≥ Resolved Docker compatibility issues
üé® Enhanced mod card layout and styling
üìñ Updated UI to acknowledge GameBanana as data source
‚ö° Various performance optimizations and stability improvements

0.5.0.title: Stability & New Features
features: üõ°Ô∏è Fixed Windows crash issue with single-instance plugin
‚ú® Added this "What's New" dialog to showcase updates
‚ö†Ô∏è New outdated mod warning system for better mod management
üéÆ Updated champion roster with latest Deadlock heroes
üîß Fixed Custom Launch Options not respecting enabled/disabled status
üé® Enhanced UI components and layout improvements
üîß Various stability improvements and bug fixes

0.4.0.title: Better Download Management & UI Refresh
features: ‚ú® Refreshed user interface with improved navigation
üì• Enhanced download management system
üêõ Fixed mod deletion issues (thanks @Skeptic-systems)
üîß Better error handling and user feedback

0.3.0.title: UI Refactor & Download Improvements
features: üé® Complete UI overhaul for better user experience
üì¶ Improved download management
‚ö° Performance optimizations
üîÑ Updated core dependencies

0.2.0.title: Error Tracking & Permissions Fix
features: üìä Added Sentry issue tracking for better bug reports
üîê Fixed updater permissions issues
üõ°Ô∏è Enhanced error reporting and diagnostics
